content.raw:
I just tried this out. Really cool and useful! Have you considered having a `default` for `world_xacro_target` and `world_target`? It definitely is nice to have control of where these files go, but the command `roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_worlds.launch requested:=/home/<username>/generated_worlds/worlds.yaml world_xacro_target:=/home/<username>/generated_worlds/world_xacros/ world_target:=/home/<username>/generated_worlds/worlds/ --screen` is quite long, so it might be nice to have a default eg. create a directory next to the .yaml file with the directory name `<yaml_file_name>_xacros` and `<yaml_file_name>_worlds`

Otherwise, this looks really good!
